dcterms:creator: E. Vasquez Osorio
J. Shortall
J. Robbins
M. Van Herk
dcterms:description: A publicly-available dataset of 34 head and neck CT scans, with segmentations of organs-at-risk performed by two doctors. The dataset includes ground truth segmentations of the left and right parotid glands, which were laterally flipped to create a dataset of 68 segmentations.
dcterms:title: Head and Neck CT Scans
